title: Popstar Ahri?

embed.description: The newest popstar was snapped practicing fresh dance moves, and with her stage show including a dramatic new entrance and exit, not to mention melodic new particles and a rhythmically-inclined Spirit Orb, Popstar Ahri's sure to charm her way to your skin collection.

body: Did i miss something?, i just got an email with the link attached, btw, attached i sthe image showing the email in my inbox with the date of today.. so anyone has any idea why they sent this email?, or popstar ahri was kind of  a legacy skin?

replies.body: That seems like a very sketchy email. Don't enter your acct info anywhere.

I know that, anyway i checked the email from "sender"... is that a word??.. anyway, it is the same e-mail that notifies me everytime i buy RP and it does not ask me for any kind of info, just notifies me that "Popstar Ahri returns for another tour", which i find particularly suspicious the "return" part
Oh, this was sent out a long time ago... :2 Like back when the skin came out.
Lol the email says " Ahri returns", and is true it was received yesterday D:
